name: Filibuster
description:
Ever wanted to run for something? 

Well first you'll need to know what to talk - and as we all know, the people in power just speak nonsense.

Simply type what you see and you can speak nonsense too!

The people in power ignore grammar, so ignore that, ignore those space too, and ignore the capital letters and ignore the full stops....

How much nonsense can you speak in 60 seconds?
